name: Tik Tok Challenge Bottle Jump
description:
Are you looking for new challenges? This game is your today challenge. How to play? That's easy, you need to throw the bottle by tapping the screen and keep it balanced while you're throwing it out.
Get the highest score and share it with your friends.
DISCLAIMER :
This app is not affiliated with TIKTOK. We do NOT provide any hacks or anything illegal other TIKTOK related product.
